name: 莊惠鈞
objective:
本課程旨在提昇學生撰寫結構完整段落和短文之能力，並著重如何重寫、摘要、 轉述、 陳述、筆記、編排、起草、修改等相關技巧。

The writing course will emphasizes grammar, vocabulary, and structure, while introducing pragmatic aspects to ensure natural and appropriate writing. AI tools such as ChatGPT will be integrated to help students learn more effectively.
